column1:
vikings,"2019-01-07T03:25:54.54Z","Some of the Best Brickheads Yet","

Box/Instructions:
Comes in a larger brick head box. It comes with two instructions, one for Newt and one for Grindelwald.
You get two sticks (One dark brown and one brown) and also a suitcase for Newt. You get the normal printed pieces on the front and the black eyes. You do get a dark grey eye for Grindelwald
column2: because of the two different eye colors.&nbsp

column1: The build was quick and easy. Took me under 10 minutes to build it.
When I was finished I was really happy. These are some of the best brickheads I have bought yet. Pairing these two together was a really smart idea.

Overall this is a great pair of brickheads to get. I highly recommend getting these. The wands and suitcase were nice additions to them as well. The different color eyes on him was very nice as well. Overall I'
